body.name: Light Bulb Security Camera,1080P Wireless Light Bulb Camera for Pet Camera, 360 ° PTZ Light Socket Camera with Motion Detection Auto Tracking (2Pack 2.4GHz with No SD Card)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 min
features: 【1080P Resolution & 360 ° Panorama View】This light bulb security camera features a high-definition 1080P resolution, provide clear and detailed video footage.The light bulb camera that has 360° field of view -- rotates 360° horizontally and 110° vertically. Pan and tilt easily with the App.Support to generate panoramic pictures on the cloud platform, and see every corner of the home in all directions, warmly guard home security .(Works with 2.4GHz WiFi only, NOT supported 5GHz WiFi)

【Full Color Night Vision】To enhance the overall night vision experience, our camera incorporates advanced image processing algorithms. These algorithms optimize the captured images, adjusting contrast levels, and enhancing details, all of which contribute to clearer and more discernible visuals. At night cam esupport 3 mode ( Full Color / Nigh Infrared / Smart Light )the camera's night vision capabilities enable it to capture quality images even in low-light conditions.

【Motion Detection &Two-way Aduio】The light bulb camera is equipped with motion detection technology, open the motion tracking and detection and customize the sensitivity and frequency before using camera.Upon detecting motion, it sends an alert to your connected device, allowing you to promptly view the live feed. Additionally, This wifi camera is fitted with microphones and speaker that lets you talk or listen to family member, friends, pets or chase away intruders in a distance.

【SD/Cloud Storage & Remote App Control】 The cameras for home security offers flexible storage options. It provides cloud storage capabilities, allowing you to securely store and access your recorded footage remotely by APP. This ensures that even if the camera is damaged or stolen, your footage remains safe. Additionally, the camera supports SD storage, enabling you to use a micro SD (Not inclued SD card) card or other external storage devices for video storage.

【Easy to Install and After Sales Services】 Installing wireless security camera is a hassle-free process. This WiFi bulb camera can be installed easily using a normal E27 bulb base adapter (Package Included), The camera is designed for user-friendly installation, with clear instructions and intuitive setup processes. Moreover, provide reliable after-sales services, including customer support, technical assistance, and warranty coverage, ensuring that you have assistance whenever needed.
body.description: Light Bulb Security Camera - 1080P Wireless Light Socket Security Camera for Light Bulb Pet Camera, 360 °Panorama with Night Vision Motion Detection Auto Tracking （Not Included SD Card)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 92 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome and Easy
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect to have to be aware of what is going on when you are not at home and keep eye on things. Setup took few minutes but follow directions and you will be successful. You can adjust, talk, listen and absolutely love it. Worth money for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent security camera.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excellent video security camera. Sharpest video picture I’ve ever seen. When set on intelligent, it tracks the moving subject. Works exceedingly well during darkness. The price is fantastic for the quality of the camera. I have the 5G model. It was so very easy to set up. I could not be happier with my purchase. I will purchase more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective in short time
reviews.reviewText: Bought them because i thought the price for 2 was great however the camera has completely stopped working in less than two months which is just ridiculous. I had issues connecting it to the app which i ignored but the fact that I finally connected it and the device itself has stopped working in such a short space and i didnt do anything for such incident to occur turns me off. Complete waste of my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive security
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy install and app set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good Design Idea but twitchy
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as they were priced nicely and the design idea intriqued me. Came quickly. To install I had to replace my front porch light fixture to accommodate the camera, which I expected. But, I could only program one of the two cameras and only after multiple tries. But every time there was movement, a bug flying across the camera, or a car from my neighbors driving by I would get a notification. Sometimes four to six false alarms each night, even with the sensitivity set as low as possible. Moving the camera from the phone app is very twitchy. Sometimes it reverses after I move it. Bothersome. There is not a lot of support that was helpful on the website. I regret buying them to be honest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: This product works well for us. It is uncomplicated and user-friendly.We recommend if you are searching for Light Bulb Security Camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Tiny View Area
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Very Inexpensive. DC Adapters. Pan Tilt or Zoom from app. Can set to auto track motion. Very easy set up. Can customize Alerts. Can view playback recordings from SD card, or from optional cloud account. Decent video clarity. No adapter needed for the micro usb slot.Cons: Tiniest view area I’ve ever seen. Instructions state it supports up to 128 gig SD card, but I didn’t see that in the description. The 256 gig SD card seemed to be OK, since I was able to view recordings the first night. But the second day, it shows No Recordings. Previous recordings are gone. I won’t use the 2nd one until I have time to Google/YouTube and figure it all out. But if you’re tech savvy and only need to view a narrow section of a room, like a crib or pet crate, then this is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product... the camera and the audio are perfect. Set up was easy and the durability is second to none. I will definitely be recommending this camera to everyone!!
